mapper.select: update org_user set updatetime = now(),account = #{account} where organid = #{organId} and usertype = '1'

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT org_organ.*,org_user.account,org_organ_company_ref.companyid FROM org_organ, org_user, org_organ_company_ref WHERE org_organ_company_ref.organid = org_organ.id AND org_organ_company_ref.userid = org_user.id AND org_organ.`Status` = 1 AND org_user.`Status` = 1 AND org_organ_company_ref.`Status` = 1 AND org_organ_company_ref.companyid = #{companyId}) t WHERE ( t.fullname = #{fullName} or t.shortname = #{shortName} or t.account = #{account} or t.email = #{email} or t.creditcode = #{creditCode} or t.businesslicense = #{businessLicense} ) and t.id != #{id}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT org_organ.*,org_user.account,org_organ_company_ref.companyid FROM org_organ, org_user, org_organ_company_ref WHERE org_organ_company_ref.organid = org_organ.id AND org_organ_company_ref.userid = org_user.id AND org_organ.`Status` = 1 AND org_user.`Status` = 1 AND org_organ_company_ref.`Status` = 1 ) t WHERE t.account = #{account} and t.id != #{id}

SELECT org_organ.*,org_user.account,org_organ_company_ref.lineofcredit,org_user.id as userId, (SELECT pub_cityaddr.city FROM pub_cityaddr WHERE pub_cityaddr.id=org_organ.city) AS citycaption,org_organ_company_ref.nextlineofcredit,org_organ_company_ref.companyid FROM org_organ, org_user, org_organ_company_ref WHERE org_organ_company_ref.organid = org_organ.id AND org_organ_company_ref.userid = org_user.id AND org_organ.id=#{id}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT (@rownum := @rownum + 1) AS indexnum, m.* FROM ( SELECT org_organ.*, org_user.account, ( SELECT pub_cityaddr.city FROM pub_cityaddr WHERE pub_cityaddr.id = org_organ.city AND pub_cityaddr. STATUS = 1 ) AS citycaption FROM org_organ, org_organ_company_ref, org_user, (SELECT @rownum := 0) r WHERE org_organ. STATUS = 1 AND org_organ_company_ref. STATUS = 1 AND org_organ_company_ref.organid = org_organ.id AND org_organ_company_ref.userid = org_user.id AND org_organ_company_ref.companyid = #{leasesCompanyId} AND org_organ.`Status` = 1 AND org_organ_company_ref.`Status` = 1 AND org_user.`Status` = 1
and org_organ.id like "%"#{queryShortName}"%"
and org_organ.id IN ( SELECT le_roledataauthority.dynamicid as organid FROM le_roledataauthority, le_roleuser, le_user WHERE le_roledataauthority.status=1 and le_roleuser.status=1 and le_user.status=1 and le_user.id = le_roleuser.userid and le_roleuser.roleid = le_roledataauthority.roleid and le_user.account=#{account} and le_user.leasescompanyid = #{leasesCompanyId} )
and org_organ.city like "%"#{queryCity}"%"
and org_organ.cooperationstatus = #{cooperationStatus}
and org_organ.customertype = #{queryCustomertype}
ORDER BY CONVERT(citycaption USING gbk ) COLLATE gbk_chinese_ci , org_organ.CreateTime ) m ) t

choose.when:
SELECT org_organ.id, org_organ.shortname AS text
FROM org_organ
WHERE org_organ. STATUS = 1
and org_organ.id IN ( SELECT le_roledataauthority.dynamicid as organid FROM le_roledataauthority, le_roleuser, le_user WHERE le_roledataauthority.status=1 and le_roleuser.status=1 and le_user.status=1 and le_user.id = le_roleuser.userid and le_roleuser.roleid = le_roledataauthority.roleid and le_user.account=#{account} and le_user.leasescompanyid = #{leasesCompanyId} )
and shortname like "%"#{queryShortName}"%"
GROUP BY shortname
choose.otherwise:
SELECT org_organ.id, org_organ.shortname AS text
FROM org_organ, org_organ_company_ref WHERE org_organ. STATUS = 1 AND org_organ_company_ref. STATUS = 1 AND org_organ_company_ref.organid = org_organ.id AND org_organ_company_ref.companyid = #{leasesCompanyId}
and shortname like "%"#{queryShortName}"%"
GROUP BY shortname

choose.when:
SELECT org_organ.city AS id, ( SELECT pub_cityaddr.city FROM pub_cityaddr WHERE pub_cityaddr.id = org_organ.city AND pub_cityaddr. STATUS = 1 ) AS text FROM org_organ WHERE org_organ. STATUS = 1
and org_organ.id IN ( SELECT le_roledataauthority.dynamicid as organid FROM le_roledataauthority, le_roleuser, le_user WHERE le_roledataauthority.status=1 and le_roleuser.status=1 and le_user.status=1 and le_user.id = le_roleuser.userid and le_roleuser.roleid = le_roledataauthority.roleid and le_user.account=#{account} and le_user.leasescompanyid = #{leasesCompanyId} )
and ( SELECT pub_cityaddr.city FROM pub_cityaddr WHERE pub_cityaddr.id = org_organ.city AND pub_cityaddr. STATUS = 1 ) like "%"#{queryCity}"%"

mapper.update: update org_organ_company_ref set nextlineofcredit = #{nextLineOfCredit},UpdateTime = now() where companyid = #{companyId} and organid = #{organId}
mapper.select: select * from pub_cityaddr where city = #{cityName} and `status`=1

SELECT org_organ.* FROM org_organ, org_organ_company_ref WHERE org_organ.`Status` = 1 AND org_organ_company_ref.`Status`=1 AND org_organ.id = org_organ_company_ref.organid AND org_organ_company_ref.companyid = #{id} ORDER BY org_organ.CreateTime DESC LIMIT 1

where t.rownum > #{iDisplayStart} and t.rownum <= (#{iDisplayStart} + #{iDisplayLength})
